Articles.Content:
Hi all.

I just ran into a minor problem in the VAB in that if you create a ship and then change its name to one already in the savefile, its overwrites the one in the savefile without warning when you save it

Boris

'there went 2 hrs of building/testing/crashing'
Yeah, it would be nice if we at least had a save warning that we are trying to overwrite a file.
